Author: bailey8889
Content: CVC-RV has a 3-4x speed up on sky130 tinytapeout with optimazation, but it's written in C++. I think I remember over a 2x gain with magic/netgen.

Author: rtimothyedwards_19428
Content: @bailey :  I haven't run a comparison recently.  It's possible that I have now knocked down enough of the truly horrible chokepoints in the code that the performance provided by compiler optimization is actually significant. . .

Author: mithro_
Content: @Tim Edwards - Compilers have gotten a lot better over the years. Also you can generate pretty good debugging symbols for optimized code these days.
